name: Plug in Baby (hazzpants)
description:
A precision platformer powered by power plugs.

You play as RBD, a toy robot who has been reactivated. He finds new life in an old abandoned house, yet he feels he's not truly at home. Connecting to a power source brings him to life, yet he does not truly feel alive. Connected, yet distant.

Navigate through the household, find RBD's calling, and help him feel whole again.
